item.title: CASHCOW TEAM Needed LONG TERM To Make High Quality (Faceless Videos) Money-Making Online Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a full production team with script writers and video editors focused on developing engaging, high-quality videos in the "make money online" niche. Our mission is to provide value-packed content that educates and motivates our audience to leverage the internet for financial success.  We are expanding our team to include talented individuals who can innovate and grow with us in the digital space.

**Job Description:**
We are looking for a talented team who specializes in writing scripts and editing faceless videos for the make money online niche. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of YouTube's platform, including trends and analytics, and be adept at producing high-quality content that does not feature on-camera talent. Your role will involve heavy editing, including the integration of engaging images, animations, and clips to convey messages effectively and engagingly.

**Responsibilities:**
- Create and edit faceless videos that are engaging and informative, focusing on the "make money online" niche.
- Research and implement the most effective editing techniques to ensure content is visually appealing.
- Innovate and recreate content based on existing popular formats from specified YouTube channels.
- Collaborate with the content team to plan and execute video projects.
- Manage multiple projects from conception through to final delivery, ensuring all videos meet the quality standards and are delivered on schedule.
- Analyze performance data to improve video strategies and increase viewer engagement and retention.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience as a Video Editor or similar role with a portfolio showcasing your ability to produce engaging digital content.
- Strong expertise in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects, etc.).
- Excellent understanding of YouTube's platform, including SEO, analytics, and content optimization.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to meet deadlines in a remote setting.
- Creative thinker with the ability to adapt and recreate any requested video in an original and engaging manner.
- Experience creating faceless videos is highly preferred.

**Do Not Apply If:**
- You do not have a portfolio that includes relevant video production or editing work.
- You lack experience in YouTube content creation and optimization.

Budget for entire project is $10,000 and will increase depending on the success of the project. Provide your lowest flat rate bid for 8 to 15 minute. We will only take those with the lowest bids. Keep in mind this project is long term work.

This is the example of the editing style in this youtube channel link: We will further discuss the script style but you must have a great understanding of youtube and the make money online niche.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eK0S3LPU0L0

To apply, please provide your lowest flat rate bid per video. Keep in mind this project is for long term work. If your bid is too high, we will hire other candidates.



Budget: $10,000
Posted On: June 19, 2024 17:08 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Content Writing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Content Writing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creator + Editor for How-To Tutorial Videos (Long-term, Native US/English accent required) - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a video creator with a knack for making informative how-to/tutorial videos or are you more interest in comparing videos?

If so, we have an amazing opportunity for you to join our team and showcase your talents on our established YouTube channel.

We're looking for individuals who can create engaging step-by-step tutorials for software, apps, and email marketing tools. Please note, these are not animated explainer videos; we require screen recordings.

Requirements:
- Proficiency in English (native speakers preferred)
- Willingness to record your phone/computer screen, along with your voice
- Ability to explain concepts clearly and concisely
- Access to a high-quality microphone

I'm looking for someone that:
- That's able to work with deadlines
- Can edit videos in bulk
- Knows how to make a tutorial video more engaging and visually appealing
- Understands English very well so you can match the editing with the voice over smoothly.

What's in it for you:
- Payment per video, paid weekly. The more videos you create, the more you earn.
- Flexible work hours – you can record at your convenience.
- Collaborate with a motivated team to produce valuable content.
- A long-term position offering stability and flexibility.

If this opportunity appeals to you, we'd love to hear from you! This job post is for the long-term, so if you're looking for a long, stable income with flexible hours then this might be the right job for you!

Please include a voice sample + video editing examples with your message, and don't hesitate to ask any questions you may have. If you don’t include a voice sample I won’t react. Also please mention your favorite animal in the first sentence of your application.

Looking forward to connecting!

Best regards,
Evelien





Hourly Range: $18.00-$48.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 17:05 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Voice-Over, English, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Content Writing, Voice Acting, Writing, Audio Production
Skills: Voice-Over, English, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Content Writing, Voice Acting, Writing, Audio Production
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.title: UGC Video Series Project for Protein Powder (Male Creator Needed) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for 5 male creators to make 5 videos each about our protein powder. We are looking for:

- a man in his 30-40s who knows a lot about finance/works in finance
-skilled grill master or cook, aged 35-50
-a man 35+ who is a handy man/skilled in DIYing (home improvement, car mechanics, etc.)
- a man 40+ who can emulate a C-Suite executive at a company
- a knowledgeable and skilled golfer in his 30s or 40s

Each of the 5 videos will be short, testimonial/skit videos talking about our protein powder from your point of view.

- You are a native speaker of Icelandic
- You can film and edit your own videos

- 15 scripted videos - acting out a short scenario while speaking Icelandic.
- Video length 10-30 seconds

item.title: Video Editing and Voice-over for Dental Office - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can edit and voice over videos for our business. The videos will be used for various purposes, such as promotional materials, social media content, and presentations. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing software and possess a creative eye for detail. Good communication skills and the ability to follow instructions are essential. We also require someone with a clear and professional voice for the voice-over work. Attention to timing and the ability to convey the intended message effectively are crucial. The selected candidate will need to have access to their own equipment and software.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Voice-over
- Attention to detail
- Communication skills
- Ability to follow instructions

Preference given to those who have worked with medical practices

item.title: EXPERT Video Editor - Youtube Editor To Create High Quality NBA Videos (LARGE Channel) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi There,

I'm looking for someone with professional video editing experience to help produce videos for my NBA Youtube channel

Your job will be to combine Youtube clips, use specified NBA highlight player B-roll,  Screen capture of blog posts/images/stats into a finish youtube video.

You should also be able to do VFX and create animation or informative graphs.

The channel is similar to the "cash cow" or "faceless youtube" channels except I've been doing this documentary style NBA videos for 3 years.

I'm going to provide you with a full written script and links to clips we want to use.  I'm going to speak over parts of the video but the script will give you a great idea of what the visual presentation should be

Here's examples of other channels finished products:
Jxmy Highroller
Non Stop Sports

I would like someone who is hard working, creative, and wants to work long term.

Ideally you love the NBA or at-least familiar with the game and the key players. We will work together to create videos.  I imagine there will be a few drafts until we get the audio and visual presentation to match well enough to put up on youtube.

Please send me examples of your work.

Thanks!


---

**If you profile looks nice we will start with a 1 minute test edit so I can see if you fit well with our team**

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 16:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Photo Editing, Video Production, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Photoshop, YouTube, Motion Graphics
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Photo Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, YouTube, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics

item.title: High Quality Explainer Video Maker - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled and creative video maker who can produce high-quality explainer videos for our brand. As a leading tech startup we help brands make their products smart and we need videos that effectively communicate the benefits and functionalities of our product. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating engaging and visually appealing videos that can capture the attention of our target audience.

Skills required:
-Proven experience in creating explainer videos with a strong portfolio.
-Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects).
-Ability to create visually appealing graphics and animations.
-Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
-Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

Note: The animation will be just for graphics, no animated figures. Prefer the use of stock footage in all videos. We will be using a mix of stock footage and animations eg: phone screens, scans, text, icons, graphics etc)

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of four weeks. We are seeking an intermediate-level video maker who can bring our brand's vision to life through captivating explainer videos.

We will be starting with one video and move on to creating more based on their performance. The budget is for three videos in total.

For reference, please checkout the landing pages of our offering to three audience segments:
https://xentag.com/stadium-engagement/
https://xentag.com/fan-merch-traders-tribes/
https://xentag.com/channel-partner/

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 19, 2024 16:38 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Production, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Video Editing
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Production, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Video Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

Note: The animation will be just for graphics, no animated figures. Prefer the use of stock footage in all videos. We will be using a mix of stock footage and animations eg: phone screens, scans, text, icons, graphics etc)

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of four weeks. We are seeking an intermediate-level video maker who can bring our brand's vision to life through captivating explainer videos.

We will be starting with one video and move on to creating more based on their performance. The budget is for three videos in total.

For reference, please checkout the landing pages of our offering to three audience segments:
https://xentag.com/stadium-engagement/
https://xentag.com/fan-merch-traders-tribes/
https://xentag.com/channel-partner/

Budget: $400

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are a digital media company focused on demystifying and disseminating knowledge about Artificial Intelligence (AI) and technology to a global audience. Our mission is to produce engaging, informative, and high-quality YouTube content that makes the complex world of AI and tech accessible to everyone. We're a team of passionate creators, thinkers, and technologists dedicated to educating and inspiring our viewers with cutting-edge insights into AI and its impact on the world around us.

We are seeking a talented and creative Freelance Video Editor with a keen eye for storytelling to join our dynamic content creation team. As an integral part of our team, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the visual narrative of our AI-focused YouTube content, ensuring it is engaging, informative, and visually compelling. You will be responsible for creating 8-12 minute videos 1-3 times per week. Your expertise in video editing will transform raw footage into polished gems that captivate our audience and elevate our brand.

Requirements:
1.  Excellent English speaking and communication
2. Must own video editing software with expertise in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Adobe After Effects)
3. Turnaround time of 48H Or less per video
4. A strong understanding of the YouTube platform, including best practices for engagement and optimization.
5. Willing to work long term and grow with the team

Please submit your resume, a brief cover letter explaining why you're the perfect fit for this role, and links to previous work samples or a reel that highlights your video editing skills, particularly any content related to technology, science, or education.

We are an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Join us in our journey to enlighten and entertain our audience through the power of AI-driven storytelling. We look forward to seeing your creativity in action!



Posted On: June 19, 2024 16:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, YouTube, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, YouTube, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Creator for The Hotel Diva YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video creator to produce engaging and high-quality videos for our new YouTube channel, The Hotel Diva. As a video creator, you will be responsible for editing visually stunning videos that align with our brand image and target audience. The videos will range from hotel reviews and travel guides to behind-the-scenes footage and vlogs.

  Skills needed:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Experience in storyboarding and video production
  - Ability to work with voice-over artists and incorporate sound design

  This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 3 to 6 months. Possibly longer if successful. We expect the video creator to work closely with our marketing team to understand our brand guidelines and target audience. The ideal candidate should have an intermediate level of expertise in video creation and a portfolio demonstrating their previous work. Join us in creating captivating videos for The Hotel Diva and help us grow our YouTube channel!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 16:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
